meta_description: Hangzhou Karn New Building Materials Co., Ltd. is a professional wallpaper adhesive powder manufacturer dedicated to providing high-quality, eco-friendly products and OEM/ODM services.

hero.title: About Hangzhou Karn New Building Materials Co., Ltd.
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Wallpaper Adhesive Specialist

company.title: Company Profile
company.paragraph1: Established in 2010, Hangzhou Karn New Building Materials Co., Ltd. is a company specializing in the research, development, production, and sales of wallpaper adhesive powder. After years of development, we have become a well-known high-quality wallpaper adhesive supplier in the industry.
company.paragraph2: We have modern production equipment and a professional R&D team, providing high-performance, environmentally friendly wallpaper adhesive products to global customers. Karn's products are highly recognized by customers for their excellent adhesion, ease of use, and environmental characteristics.
company.paragraph3: In addition to our standard product series, we also provide comprehensive OEM/ODM services, customizing product formulations, packaging, and branding according to specific customer requirements. As a socially responsible company, we are always committed to environmentally friendly production and sustainable development.

advantages.title: Our Advantages
advantages.subtitle: Why Global Customers Choose Karn's Wallpaper Adhesive Products

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: We employ a rigorous quality control system with each batch of products undergoing multi-stage testing to ensure compliance with international quality standards.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.description: With 15 years of industry experience, our technical team is proficient in wallpaper adhesive formula development and production processes.

eco.title: Environmental Commitment
eco.description: Our products use renewable plant starch as the main raw material, are low-pollution, non-toxic, and safe, meeting international environmental standards.

service.title: Comprehensive Service
service.description: We provide full-spectrum support from product development and technical assistance to after-sales service, ensuring customer satisfaction.

history.title: Company Development History
history.subtitle: Key milestones from founding to becoming an industry leader

events.founding: Company established in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, focusing on the development and production of wallpaper adhesive powder.
events.expansion: Expanded production facilities and introduced advanced automated production lines, significantly increasing production capacity.
events.international: Began expanding into international markets with products exported to countries in Asia, Europe, and North America.
events.present: Developed a new generation of environmentally friendly wallpaper adhesive products, strengthening global market presence and brand building.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.subtitle: Our products and production processes comply with international standard certifications
certifications.iso9001: ISO 9001 Quality Management System Certification ensures our production processes and product quality meet international standards.
certifications.iso14001: ISO 14001 Environmental Management System Certification demonstrates our commitment and practice in environmental protection.
certifications.ce: CE Certification indicates that our products comply with safety, health, and environmental protection requirements for the European Union market.

cta.title: Ready to Start Cooperation?
cta.description: Whether you need high-quality wallpaper adhesive products or are looking for OEM/ODM services, we can provide the best solution for you.
